response.overview: "When Tutankhamun's tomb was opened in the 1920s, the world was mesmerised. It was the first time a royal burial has been found in such pristine condition. However soon after its discovery, mysterious events lead to rumours of a curse. Soon enough, the lines between the archaeological and the supernatural blur. Fueled by preconceived notions of Ancient Egypt and a media frenzy, The Curse of Tutankhamun manages to pique the interest of people around the world. In this documentary join expert Egyptologist's and scholars as they attempt to unmask the curse's surprising true nature."
response.title: Tutankhamun: Unmasking the Curse
